body:
So recently, I noticed that when I go on my PC and try to break blocks, my sensitivity jumps up to hyperspeed. I tried changing my breaking button to R, and it didn't happen when I did that. 

I have used a total of 2 mice and both of them did this. It pretty much makes it impossible to play.

Any ideas on how to fix this?

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sfdF7eA6GP4&feature=youtu.be

replies.body:
Only advice i have which fixed a problem for me is... 

Right click on Mc go to Properties
Go to Compatibility 
Make sure the program is running in compatibility mode for whatever system you use.
Tick , run as administrator.

Worked for me.
